Package ray.rage.asset.texture

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    TextureLoader
    A texture loader is an asset-loader that can load images from the file system to be used as textures.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Texture
    A texture is an asset that contains a buffered-image in the sRGB color-space and can be mapped to a mesh's geometry for rendering, among other things.
    TextureManager
    A texture manager is responsible for managing the life-cycle of textures.
